languages.text: Base armour property: +15 Strength While the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, their melee attacks deal +15% damage. After a successful parry, the wearer gains {uip|THP|eb997dc4a9304767b8c573512d3d828c} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}がある場合、近接攻撃ダメージが+15%増加する。使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}場合、+{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}を得る。 基本アーマー特性：+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}。
languages.original_text: While the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, their melee attacks deal +15% more damage. Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} the enemy attack, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}がある場合、近接攻撃ダメージが+15%増加する。使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}場合、+{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}を得る。 基本アーマー特性：+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}。

languages.text: Tant que l'utilisateur a des {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}, ses attaques de mêlée infligent +15 % de dégâts. Dès que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} une attaque ennemie, il gagne +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +15 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, their melee attacks deal +15% more damage. Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} the enemy attack, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tant que l'utilisateur a des {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}, ses attaques de mêlée infligent +15 % de dégâts. Dès que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} une attaque ennemie, il gagne +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +15 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.

languages.text: Cuando el portador tiene {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}, sus ataques cuerpo a cuerpo infligen un +15 % más de daño. Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}para{/g} un ataque, gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, their melee attacks deal +15% more damage. Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} the enemy attack, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador tiene {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}, sus ataques cuerpo a cuerpo infligen un +15 % más de daño. Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}para{/g} un ataque, gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.

languages.text: 如果装备者拥有{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，则其近战攻击造成的伤害提高15%。 每当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}敌人的攻击时，都会获得{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。 基础护甲特性：+15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。
languages.original_text: While the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, their melee attacks deal +15% more damage. Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} the enemy attack, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者拥有{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，则其近战攻击造成的伤害提高15%。 每当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}敌人的攻击时，都会获得{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。 基础护甲特性：+15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。

languages.text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanına sahipken yaptığı yakın dövüş saldırıları +%15 daha fazla hasar verir. Giyen kişi, düşman saldırısını her {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturduğunda{/g} + {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır. Taban zırh özelliği: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, their melee attacks deal +15% more damage. Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} the enemy attack, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanına sahipken yaptığı yakın dövüş saldırıları +%15 daha fazla hasar verir. Giyen kişi, düşman saldırısını her {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturduğunda{/g} + {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır. Taban zırh özelliği: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}.

languages.text: Hat der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}, verursachen seine Nahkampfangriffe +15 % mehr Schaden. Wenn der Träger den Angriff des Gegners {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, erhält er +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, their melee attacks deal +15% more damage. Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} the enemy attack, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hat der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}, verursachen seine Nahkampfangriffe +15 % mehr Schaden. Wenn der Träger den Angriff des Gegners {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, erhält er +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.

languages.text: Пока у персонажа есть {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, его атаки в ближнем бою наносят на 15% больше урона. Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} атаку врага, он получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}. Базовое свойство: +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
languages.original_text: While the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, their melee attacks deal +15% more damage. Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} the enemy attack, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Пока у персонажа есть {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, его атаки в ближнем бою наносят +15% урона дополнительно. Когда персонаж успешно {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} атаку врага, он каждый раз получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}. Базовое свойство: +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

Пока у персонажа есть {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, его атаки в ближнем бою наносят на 15% больше урона. Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} атаку врага, он получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}. Базовое свойство: +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
